tool_description: Generates cryptographically secure, unique serial numbers for certificates following CA/Browser Forum guidelines and ensuring no collisions with existing certificates.

entropy_bits.description: Number of entropy bits for serial number generation (64-159)

format.description: Serial number format: HEX or DECIMAL

error_messages: Invalid entropy bits: Entropy must be between 64-159 bits as per CA/Browser Forum requirements.
Unsupported format: Use HEX or DECIMAL format only.
Serial collision detected: Generated serial number already exists, regeneration required.
Insufficient entropy: System entropy pool insufficient for secure serial generation.
usage: Optionally specify entropy_bits and format. Tool generates cryptographically secure serial numbers that are guaranteed to be unique within the CA's certificate database.

entropy_used.description: Actual entropy bits used in generation

generation_timestamp.description: Timestamp when serial number was generated

format_used.description: Format of the generated serial number
